Text

Classes disponibles :

.u-text-ellipsis {
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  white-space: nowrap;
}

.u-text-left {
  text-align: left;
}

.u-text-right {
  text-align: right;
}

.u-text-center {
  text-align: center;
}

Exemple

Hello world lorem ispsum dolor sit amet

Hello world lorem ispsum dolor sit amet

Hello world lorem ispsum dolor sit amet

Hello world lorem ispsum dolor sit amet

  <p class="u-mb-sm u-text-left">Hello world lorem ispsum dolor sit amet</p>
  <p class="u-mb-sm u-text-right">Hello world lorem ispsum dolor sit amet</p>
  <p class="u-mb-sm u-text-center">Hello world lorem ispsum dolor sit amet</p>
  <p class="u-mb-sm u-text-ellipsis" style="max-width:12rem">Hello world lorem ispsum dolor sit amet</p>
